trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Lockport
There were no other sightings in Lockport on or around August 5th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsComing home around 9-10 pm, in the Lockport area. Tudor lane to be exact. Looked at the sky and saw a bright white star like object in the night sky, moving slowly in a straight line. Thought it might be a plane, but i did not witness any lights planes normally have.Stayed consistently bright white. I was very shocked and confused, not sure what it could be. I know it was no plane. At least none that i have seen looked like that. I was on foot and lost sight of the object. Was hoping someone else saw it as well.
Summary: Bright white star like object in the night sky, moving slowly in a straight line.
